colleges.name: Indian Institute of Technology, Madras
colleges.description: IIT Madras is a leading engineering and technology university in India, consistently ranked #1 by NIRF.

colleges.name: Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)
colleges.description: MIT is a world-renowned private research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts, known for its cutting-edge research and innovation.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Management, Ahmedabad
colleges.description: IIM Ahmedabad is a premier management institute in India, recognized globally for its excellence in management education and a top NIRF rank.

colleges.name: Stanford University
colleges.description: Stanford University is a private research university in Stanford, California. Stanford is known for its academic strength, wealth, and proximity to Silicon Valley.

colleges.name: University of Cambridge
colleges.description: The University of Cambridge is a collegiate research university in Cambridge, United Kingdom. It is one of the world's oldest and most prestigious universities.

colleges.name: National University of Singapore (NUS)
colleges.description: NUS is a national research university in Singapore. Founded in 1905 as the Straits Settlements and Federated Malay States Government Medical School, NUS is the oldest autonomous university in the country.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi
colleges.description: IIT Delhi is a public technical and research university located in Hauz Khas, Delhi, India. It is consistently ranked among the top engineering institutes by NIRF.

colleges.name: University of Oxford
colleges.description: The University of Oxford is a collegiate research university in Oxford, England. There is evidence of teaching as early as 1096, making it the oldest university in the English-speaking world.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay
colleges.description: IIT Bombay is a public technical and research university located in Powai, Mumbai. It holds a top position in the NIRF rankings for engineering.

colleges.name: University of Toronto
colleges.description: The University of Toronto is a public research university in Toronto, Ontario, Canada, located on the grounds that surround Queen's Park.
colleges.eligibility: High School Diploma, Specific course prerequisites

colleges.name: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Delhi
colleges.description: AIIMS Delhi is a premier medical school and hospital. It is consistently ranked as the top medical college in India by NIRF.

colleges.name: Harvard University
colleges.description: Harvard University is a private Ivy League research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts. Its history, influence, and wealth have made it one of the most prestigious universities in the world.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore
colleges.description: IISc is a public university for scientific research and higher education, consistently ranked among the top universities in India by NIRF.

colleges.name: Johns Hopkins University
colleges.description: Johns Hopkins is a private research university in Baltimore, Maryland. It is especially renowned for its medical school and the Johns Hopkins Hospital.

colleges.name: Christian Medical College, Vellore
colleges.description: CMC Vellore is a private, minority-run medical school and hospital. It is consistently ranked among the top medical colleges in India by NIRF.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Management, Bangalore
colleges.description: IIM Bangalore is a leading graduate school of management in Asia. It holds a top spot in the NIRF rankings for management.

colleges.name: The Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania
colleges.description: The Wharton School is the business school of the University of Pennsylvania, a private Ivy League research university. It is widely regarded as one of the world's leading business schools.

colleges.name: INSEAD
colleges.description: INSEAD is a non-profit graduate business school with locations in Europe, Asia, the Middle East, and North America. It is one of the world's most international business schools.

colleges.name: Post Graduate Institute of Medical Education and Research
colleges.description: PGIMER, Chandigarh is a premier medical and research institution in India, declared an 'Institute of National Importance'.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Management, Calcutta
colleges.description: IIM Calcutta was the first Indian Institute of Management to be established. It is consistently ranked as one of the best business schools in India.
